get_delta(?Var, -Width)

Returns the width of the interval of Var.
Var
A variable or a number
Width
Width of the interval

Calling Modes

  • get_delta(-, -)
  • get_delta(?, -)
  • get_delta(++, -)

Description

Returns the width (Hi - Lo) of the interval of Var. If Var has not been declared before, it will be turned into an unrestricted real variable. If Var is a ground number, the width will be calculated appropriately based on its type.

See Also

get_median / 2, get_bounds / 3
